TopicTitle: [1.1.2] KSPRC - Renaissance Compilation: artworks remake [V-0.7 Pre Release 3]

Articles.Content:
Hi!, I'm waiting for the beta of WIP-EVE. But I keep doing things.

Among others, I'm using the Kopernicus Expansion and now Jool has a pretty awesome procedural cloudmap. It flows and evolves much more like in a real giant gas. I can't wait for the multi-planet support in Scatterer, to add a cool green scattering.

http://i.imgur.com/FJeP6XC.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/eNUayuS.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/lh6IcCE.jpg

Oh my, that looks amazing! Gimme gimme gimme!

Oh my, that looks amazing! Gimme gimme gimme!

I think the update will come very very soon!

A.K.A E.V.E. got updated!

Hi!, I'm waiting for the beta of WIP-EVE. But I keep doing things.

Among others, I'm using the Kopernicus Expansion and now Jool has a pretty awesome procedural cloudmap. It flows and evolves much more like in a real giant gas. I can't wait for the multi-planet support in Scatterer, to add a cool green scattering.

Awesome!, I suggest a white sun next

Awesome!, I suggest a white sun next

IMO the white sun is more of a RSS thing. Given that Kerbol is smaller than our sun and would be cooler, yellow is a perfectly natural color for it to be. Of course, if it were yellow in space due its heat should it still appear yellow after its light scatters in the atmosphere of Kerbin? I'm not sure. Depends on how deep down the realism rabbit hole you want to go

Hi!, I'm waiting for the beta of WIP-EVE. But I keep doing things.

Among others, I'm using the Kopernicus Expansion and now Jool has a pretty awesome procedural cloudmap. It flows and evolves much more like in a real giant gas. I can't wait for the multi-planet support in Scatterer, to add a cool green scattering.

Nice Proot.

Really hoping you will release new version soon
Incase anyone hasn't seen this, EvE has been released: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-1-05-1-05-1-Nov-10-2015-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements
Scatterer has been updated! The gates of hell present themselves open! Rise KSPRC! RISE LIKE THE PHOENIX!

Correct me if i'm wrong Proot, but you are waiting for a new release of scatterer, which just happened btw, introducing multiple planet support, and the release of a new version of WIP-EVE right ?
Thanks.

[quote name='MegaUZI']Correct me if i'm wrong Proot, but you are waiting for a new release of scatterer, which just happened btw, introducing multiple planet support, and the release of a new version of WIP-EVE right ?
Thanks.[/QUOTE]
for me that sounds like hurrying someone - which wont help.
im pretty sure proot is one of the first that got the new versions - so just wait for what he ha to say about his progress - and if he doesnt say anything - so he has a RL perhaps?

btw: "WIP-EvE" is no WIP as it got released - see just 2 posts above yours.
just keep cool and get some tea ;)

[quote name='Speadge']btw: "WIP-EvE" is no WIP as it got released - see just 2 posts above yours.
just keep cool and get some tea ;)[/QUOTE]
WIP-EVE is the overhaul fork, which is different from the just-updated main branch.

[quote name='Red Iron Crown']WIP-EVE is the overhaul fork, which is different from the just-updated main branch.[/QUOTE]

well- i thought with version 1.05.1 the latest WIP version(as of nov.10th) became the official release, while the WIP-fork will be the experimental-branch forever...
[See in the missing clouds on menu & stuff that just occured in WIP until then]

thats not true?
seemed to me like this was an overhaul to the master-branch itself ;)

thats not true?

Working hard on the update.

didnt help me - confused some more as RSS/RVS is not the topic

[quote name='Speadge']didnt help me - confused some more as RSS/RVS is not the topic[/QUOTE]

well i took it that "[COLOR=#333333]This is what overhaul was. You can move to it, as this is what will be in development going forward, and uses the config mechanisms developed in overhaul" was in relation to EVE [/COLOR][COLOR=#333333][I]version 1.05.1 as thats what thread its from[/I][/COLOR]

[quote name='BrutalRIP']well i took it that "[COLOR=#333333]This is what overhaul was. You can move to it, as this is what will be in development going forward, and uses the config mechanisms developed in overhaul" was in relation to EVE [/COLOR][COLOR=#333333][I]version 1.05.1 as thats what thread its from[/I][/COLOR][/QUOTE]

he says [B](after beeing asked if someone should go to 1.05.1) [/B]that THIS is overhaul ("what overhaul was") and that this branch no is the one that is gettin updates in the future and the old 7.4 is discontinued

so - basically he says what i was thinking.. WIP EvE become final - but is still gettin updated in the "WIP-thread".. but its the same basic from now on.

[quote name='Proot']Working hard on the update.[/QUOTE]

Sounds like you got some competition now Proot. :p Astronomer is back.

[quote name='Proot']Working hard on the update.[/QUOTE]

[quote name='Motokid600']Sounds like you got some competition now Proot. :p Astronomer is back.[/QUOTE]

Really!? That is good news, indeed, Motokid. AVP and KSPRC are my two favorite visual packs (although I am closely following the development of SVE), and I can't wait to see what these two incredible artists are able to accomplish with the brand-spanking-new version of EVE. Good luck, Proot!

I do this just for fun. I don not see the need on compete with anyone. :wink:

Some pics coming soon. I want to release this ASAP. But the incoming content is pretty heavy. So please, be patient.
I'm testing all, right now, and working with the Jool system.
I need to re-add things like the auroras, which was impossible until now. And some other new things...

Well... Take it with a grain of salt lol. He only made a few posts in the EVE thread afaik so we'll have to wait and see.

Edit: I was joking with the competition comment :p No, its all for the best. Edited November 16, 2015 by Motokid600

[quote name='Motokid600']Well... Take it with a grain of salt lol. He only made a few posts the EVE thread afaik so we'll have to wait and see.[/QUOTE]

Oh, no problem, at all. I'm the first admirer of Astronomer's work, I hope he can back soon!

[quote name='Proot']I do this just for fun. I don not see the need on compete with anyone. :wink:

Some pics coming soon. I want to release this ASAP. But the incoming content is pretty heavy. So please, be patient.
I'm testing all, right now, and working with the Jool system.
I need to re-add things like the auroras, which was impossible until now. And some other new things...[/QUOTE]

When it comes to mods, patience is all that we know! We all know that the final result will be well worth the wait. Until then, have fun with development!
